title: chore: run 'capsule test' without docker
body:
Replace #31 

1. Exclude the `tests` crate in the cargo workspace.
    1. contracts may need to reference other contracts. Putting them in the same workspace simplifies this.
3. Run `capsule test` without docker.
    1. The trailing style args do not work with the clap 2.33.x, we should support it after upgrading the clap.

title: chore: generate project and contract without using docker
body: Use host cargo to generate projects and contracts. This can reduce our dependence on docker. #84 may remove the docker completely.

title: chore: remove dependency simple-jsonrpc-client and update reqwest
Improve version compatibility determination
body:
Make 0.9.1 not compatible with 0.9.2.

Make 1.2.1 compatible with 1.1.2.

title: chore: 🤖 Remove ckb-indexer-url parameter for ckb-cli
fix: compatibility with newer ckb-cli
body:
- Remove --wait-for-sync arg when calling ckb-cli
- Remove fields that no longer exists in LiveCellInfoVec

title: chore(build.rs): handle git notfound error
body:
It would be more friendly if the `git` notfound error was explicitly reported:
```
  --- stderr
  thread 'main' panicked at 'error when get commit id: `git` was not found!', build.rs:29:17
  note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace
```

title: fix: redirect docker output and run with --init
body: This PR redirects the output of docker, and allows the user to terminate the docker process with `ctrl+c` by running docker with `--init` option ( ref: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/60733727/unable-to-stop-my-docker-container-with-ctrl-c )

title: chore: update deps
body:
* update `moleculec` dep to `v0.7.3`
* update `ckb-std` dep to `v0.10.0`
* update `ckb-testtool` dep to `v0.8.0`
* update `rust-toolchain` to `1.61.0`
* update docker image
  - update toolchain to `nightly-2022-08-01`
  - update `ckb-binary-patcher`
  - update `ckb-standalone-debugger`

title: fix weird memory corruption on release build binary
body:
Encounter a weird memory problem on godwoken state-validator contract.
Suggest turn off lto optimization by default.
